alert.note: Alert for Iron (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 10:53AM CST until January 20 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches for northern Iron county, with 1 to 3 inches elsewhere. * WHERE...Iron County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the northwestern area of the Lac du Flambeau Band. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 9 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
